about_the_game:
Leaf your worries behind! Leaf Blower Sim is a relaxing simulation game about satisfyingly blowing leaves. Clean up beautiful courtyards, residential areas and gorgeous mansions as you watch each individual leaf - like your worries - blow away in the wind.

Unwind in career mode as you upgrade your tools, earn money, and grow your leaf-blowing business from the ground up- or simply blow off stress in arcade mode, jumping in and out of levels to clear leaves as you see fit.

JUMP INTO SERENE, LEAFBLOWING TRANQUILITY

Embark on a journey of leafy satisfaction as you transform disorderly lawns and scenic environments into pristine havens. Upgrade your leaf blower arsenal and unlock fun alternative levels, all while reveling in the simple joy of leaf-blowing to perfection.

RELAXING FUN WITH QUALITY-OF-LIFE FEATURES

Leaf Blower Sim is designed for relaxing, satisfying fun - that’s why we’ve added a plethora of quality-of-life features! Instantly locate hiding leaves, sort leaves into a pile ready to blow away, and get on with what you do best - blowing leaves.

FEATURES:

  • Stunning levels filled with satisfying, leaf-blowing gameplay to immerse yourself in.

  • Choose to play 1st or 3rd person mode.

  • Next gen graphics (Unreal 5), not only fun, but beautiful to look at.

  • Career mode, Speed Runs and unlockable Arcade levels.

  • Relaxing soundtrack and ambient background sounds.

  • Quality of life features including a leaf scanner & a gathering system for any hidden leaves.

  • Upgrade system for your tools - upgrade to more powerful leaf blowers and other tools.

short_description: Dive into leafy tranquility in Leaf Blower Sim, a solo adventure where you wield a powerful blower to transform messy landscapes into clean havens. Upgrade your gear, enjoy the serene atmosphere, and sculpt your outdoor sanctum. It's a relaxing escape to blow away stress, one leaf at a time.
